title: Ticket #2362: write design document for multiple claims and subclaims
description:
instead of multiple activations, explore the idea of multiple claims against a single resource and write a document detailing the concepts and work required.

at the moment we have two high level designs where it is not entire clear which is superior. i'm also pondering the introduction of a very lightweight subclaim to allow us to essentially finish the mutliple activations before moving on to heavier weight subclaims with actual resources associated with them.
